channel.title: PlayerCounter
channel.description:
My stupid playercounter at the top dissapears after like 15 seconds of being on the server. Also my player counter doesnt update as more people log in.. I'm using Devolution v7 if that helps. Im really frusterated... Any ideas?
[code]sendFrame126("@gre@YanScape @gre@(" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " online)", 6570);[/code]
Thanks.

item.title: PlayerCounter
item.dc:creator: @sexytimee sexytimee
item.description:
@sexytimee wrote:

My stupid playercounter at the top dissapears after like 15 seconds of being on the server. Also my player counter doesnt update as more people log in… I’m using Devolution v7 if that helps. Im really frusterated… Any ideas?

sendFrame126("@gre@YanScape @gre@(" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " online)", 6570);
